Articles.Content: I can't accept that, but thank you for the offer. I'd prefer to build everything myself, including whatever the next poster wants. You know what? imaginary Constructs for everyone!
I'll use your loan and make 1,000 gold statues of my fish, and give the next poster 111000 Yuan. Now I'm in debt...

I buy a small house a used car and a job 

the next poster gets 10 jebs

[Guys, please remember the rules.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112519-How-generous-are-you-feeling?p=1774237&viewfull=1#post1774237)

I send the Jebs on a mission to Kerbol. The Kerbin World Firsts Record Keeping Society gives me a grant in return.

I give Ã¢Ë†Å¡5,000,000 to the next poster!

I start building a rocket.

I give a 10,000 fund grant to the next person.

I take it, and multiply it by NaN + **Ã¢Ë†Å¾** Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ((Ã¢Ë†Å¡-1)/0). Are you broken yet?

Regardless, here's the remains of the universe after that episode.

I accept said remains, and transfer ownership to Danny2462 to see what he can do with it.

After the video is posted, the entire proceeds are $0.23

I put the amount in my change jar.

The next poster has $56.53!

I'll use that money on A really small treehouse.

The next poster has 70,000,000,000,012.42 dollars.

I will save Futurama again!

I give the next user 1,000,000 kerbucks (KSP career currency).
I spend it on making huge and useless planes. Then I give the rest to the next user. (About 70 Kerbucks.)

I will buy.... Um....

6 cubic octagonal struts!

I give the next user 13000 pesos.

I upgrade my pc, so I can record better videos! 

I throw 43.99 dollars in the next users face.

In my face means cash, so I cannot easily spend it here - will keep it then to diversify my savings!

The next user receives a 5,00 DEM (Deutsche Mark) bill and is hopefully wise enough to know what to do with it. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

\*happily orders weissbier\*Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ \*happilier drinks weissbier\*

\*leaves $999.00 CAD as a tip\*

I convert it into UK pounds, and donate it to a charity.

I leave the next user Ã‚Â£20.

Buy some tat and give it Ashens

The next lucky winner gets $123456789 USD

Oooooh, donate 3/4 of directly to poor people in Third World countries.

Have $99999999CAD

I'll buy out NASA! (those guys have absolutely no government funding at this point)

Have... um... 2 cents.

Well, it's better than nothing...

The next poster gets Ã‚Â£30.

\*Goes to London stock exchange and buys a share\*

 -- 30 Days later --

\*Sells the share for 3 pounds more, buys another, more expensive, more promising share\*

 -- Approx. 15 years later --

\*Buys Barclays for money earned share trading.\*

Now when I am rich...

\*Throws $314159.26 at the next user...\*

A single penny to the soup kitchen. The rest gets put into some IPOs, some growth stocks, maybe some CD's, and is left to the Boy Scouts or the Salvation Army when I die.

Next user gets one single United States dollar. Use it wisely.

I'll copy it. I"M RICH!

I'll donate... 391,074 Kerbucks. Which is the price of the newest Super Heavy lifter from KTE! Ehh? EH?
I buy 10 Mammoths (the rocket) and spend the rest on snacks.
I don't get any money? Oh well. I'll donate 25 Sealand Dollars to the next person.
